summary: This is a sealed federal indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell, charging her with conspiracy to entice minors to travel for illegal sex acts, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury. The indictment details her role in facilitating Jeffrey Epstein's sexual abuse of multiple minor girls from 1994 to 1997, including grooming victims and participating in abuse at various properties. It also alleges she committed perjury during a 2016 deposition.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Charged with multiple federal crimes for her role in facilitating Jeffrey Epstein's sexual abuse of minor girls, including grooming victims, participating in abuse, and committing perjury.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as the primary perpetrator of sexual abuse against minor girls, with Maxwell assisting him. His sexual preference for underage girls and specific abusive acts are detailed.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Signed the indictment as the Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

connections.description: Maxwell and Epstein conspired to entice and transport minor girls across state lines for the purpose of sexual abuse. Maxwell was in an intimate relationship with Epstein and was paid by him to manage his properties.
Maxwell facilitated Epstein's access to minor victims, groomed them, and was present for and participated in their sexual abuse by Epstein.

events.title: Period of Criminal Conspiracy and Abuse
events.description: Maxwell and Epstein conspired to and did entice, groom, and sexually abuse multiple minor girls at various Epstein properties.

events.title: Minor Victim-1 Travel from Florida to New York
events.description: Minor Victim-1 was enticed to travel from Florida to New York for the purpose of being sexually abused by Epstein at his New York residence.

events.title: Interaction with Minor Victim-2 in New Mexico
events.description: Maxwell interacted with Minor Victim-2 at Epstein's New Mexico ranch, took her shopping and to a movie, and provided her with an unsolicited topless massage as part of grooming.

events.title: Grooming of Minor Victim-3 in London
events.description: Maxwell groomed and befriended Minor Victim-3 in London, introduced her to Epstein, and arranged interactions knowing Epstein would sexually abuse her during massages.

events.title: Maxwell's First Deposition Perjury
events.description: During a deposition, Maxwell falsely testified she was unaware of any scheme by Epstein to recruit underage girls for sexual massages and denied interacting with anyone under 18 other than the plaintiff.

events.title: Maxwell's Second Deposition Perjury
events.description: During a deposition, Maxwell gave false testimony regarding her awareness of sex toys at Epstein's home, her knowledge of Epstein's other sexual partners, and whether she had ever given massages.

locations: Upper East Side, Manhattan, New York (Epstein's New York Residence)
Palm Beach, Florida (Epstein's Palm Beach Residence)
Santa Fe, New Mexico (Epstein's New Mexico Ranch)
Southern District of New York (jurisdiction for the indictment)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell is charged with conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to entice and transport minor girls across state and international lines for the purpose of sexual abuse from at least 1994 to 1997.
The indictment details a grooming process where Maxwell would befriend minor victims, normalize sexual topics and nudity, and encourage them to give massages to Epstein that led to sexual abuse.
Three specific minor victims (identified as Minor Victim-1, -2, and -3) are described, with Victim-1 being approximately 14 years old when first met and abused in New York and Florida.
Maxwell is charged with two counts of perjury for false statements made under oath in 2016 depositions, where she denied knowledge of Epstein's scheme and her own involvement.
The alleged abuse occurred at multiple Epstein-owned properties in New York, Florida, New Mexico, and at Maxwell's residence in London.
